items.name: Memory Gamma
items.title: Memory Gamma
items.headline: Welcome to the Memory Gamma wiki!
items.desc:
Memory Gamma was created to collect and share all of your Star Trek ideas.
Whether it's characters, starships, planets, or fan fiction, the Star Trek universe is now yours to expand!

Memory Gamma (or MG) is the place for all your Star Trek fan fiction sometimes known as fanon. Please contribute whatever you want that's Star Trek! However, please keep it to the canon timeline; if you want to throw out canon, please do so in an alternate reality. You may add some ideas from Star Trek books, but that's mainly for Memory Beta. Please, before you start editing Memory Gamma read the rules and regulations below, thank you, and welcome aboard.
